title: Amphitheater of Durrës
description: The Roman amphitheater of Durrës dates to the reign of Trajan. A small chapel built inside the amphitheater has mosaics likely dating to the 6th-8th centuries CE.

properties.description: Position based on OSM coordinates. Dates after BAtlas (amphitheater proper) and Deri 2017 (for the chapel mosaics).
properties.title: Imagery location of Roman amphitheater
